source:
import { Button } from "@/components/ui/button" import { Mail, Calendar, Github, Linkedin, Twitter, MessageSquare } from "lucide-react" import { contactContent } from "@/lib/constants/pages/contact" import Link from "next/link" export default function ContactPage() { const icons = { Mail, Calendar, MessageSquare } const PrimaryIcon = icons[contactContent.cta.primary.icon as keyof typeof icons] || Mail const SecondaryIcon = icons[contactContent.cta.secondary.icon as keyof typeof icons] || MessageSquare const TertiaryIcon = icons[contactContent.cta.tertiary.icon as keyof typeof icons] || Calendar return (

{contactContent.title}

{contactContent.description}

Get In Touch

I'm always excited to work on new challenges. Whether you have a specific project in mind or just want to explore possibilities, let's start the conversation.

Email
{contactContent.email}
Location
{contactContent.location}

Connect

{[ { icon: Github, href: contactContent.socials.github, label: "GitHub" }, { icon: Linkedin, href: contactContent.socials.linkedin, label: "LinkedIn" }, { icon: Twitter, href: contactContent.socials.x, label: "X" }, { icon: Mail, href: `mailto:${contactContent.email}`, label: "Email" } ].map((social, i) => ( ))}

Quick Contact

{/* */}

Book a 30-minute discovery call to discuss your project requirements.

Ready to Start?

Every great project starts with a conversation. Let's discuss your goals, explore possibilities, and create something extraordinary together.

messages.message: Unexpected any. Specify a different type.

suggestions.desc: Use `unknown` instead, this will force you to explicitly, and safely assert the type is correct.
Use `never` instead, this is useful when instantiating generic type parameters that you don't need to know the type of.

import { type SchemaTypeDefinition } from 'sanity'

import blockContent from './blockContent'
import siteSettings from './siteSettings'
import home from './home'
import experience from './experience'
import project from './project'
import about from './about'

export const schema: { types: SchemaTypeDefinition[] } = {
    types: [siteSettings, home, experience, project, about],
}
